General.Name: Pmv Pharmaceuticals Inc
General.Description: PMV Pharmaceuticals, Inc., a precision oncology company, engages in the discovery and development of small molecule and tumor-agnostic therapies for p53 mutations in cancer. The company's lead product candidate is PC14586, a small molecule that corrects mutant p53 protein containing the Y220C mutation and restores wild-type p53 function. It is also developing Wild-type p53 or other p53 mutations, including R273H, R273C, R175H, G245S, R248Q, and R282W, as well as other p53 hotspot mutations. The company was formerly known as PJ Pharmaceuticals, Inc. and changed its name to PMV Pharmaceuticals, Inc. in July 2013. PMV Pharmaceuticals, Inc. was incorporated in 2013 and is headquartered in Cranbury, New Jersey.
General.Address: 8 Clarke Drive, Cranbury, NJ, United States, 08512
